languages.text: Имперский флот насторожено взирал за восхождением фон Валанциусов. Они мнили себя псами, сторожащими стада подданых Императора, и в стаде объявился новый вожак. Потому надзор за династией осуществлялся с особой придирчивостью, и адмиралы опасались, что однажды им придется вступить в войну с Вольным Торговцем.

The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Имперский флот насторожено взирал за восхождением фон Валанциусов. Они мнили себя псами, сторожащими стада подданых Императора, и в стаде объявился новый вожак. Потому надзор за династией осуществлялся с особой придирчивостью, и адмиралы опасались, что однажды им придется вступить в войну с Вольным Торговцем.

Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: 帝国海军对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的崛起十分警惕。他们将自己视为忠诚的牧羊犬，负责看守帝皇的臣民，然而，如今的羊群却有了新的主人。正因如此，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝得到了帝国海军严密关注。所有海军上将都担心，有朝一日可能不得不向行商浪人的王朝宣战。
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 帝国海军对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的崛起十分警惕。他们将自己视为忠诚的牧羊犬，负责看守帝皇的臣民，然而，如今的羊群却有了新的主人。正因如此，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝得到了帝国海军严密关注。所有海军上将都担心，有朝一日可能不得不向行商浪人的王朝宣战。

languages.text: 帝国海軍はフォン・ヴァランシウスの反乱に警戒していた。彼らは自身を皇帝の臣下の護衛として考え、そして群れの新たな主が誕生した。したがって、王朝は最大限の注意を払って監視され、司令官たちはいつか自由開拓者との戦争に駆り出されるのではないかと恐れていた。
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 帝国海軍はフォン・ヴァランシウスの反乱に警戒していた。彼らは自身を皇帝の臣下の護衛として考え、そして群れの新たな主が誕生した。したがって、王朝は最大限の注意を払って監視され、司令官たちはいつか自由開拓者との戦争に駆り出されるのではないかと恐れていた。

languages.text: La Marine Impériale se méfiait de l'ascension des von Valancius. Ses membres se considéraient comme des chiens gardant le troupeau de sujets de l'Empereur, et il y avait un nouveau chef de meute. La dynastie bénéficiait donc d'une surveillance minutieuse, et les amiraux craignaient de devoir un jour entrer en guerre contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: La Marine Impériale se méfiait de l'ascension des von Valancius. Ses membres se considéraient comme des chiens gardant le troupeau de sujets de l'Empereur, et il y avait un nouveau chef de meute. La dynastie bénéficiait donc d'une surveillance minutieuse, et les amiraux craignaient de devoir un jour entrer en guerre contre {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: La Armada Imperial estaba inquieta por el ascenso de von Valancius. Se consideraban los perros guardianes del rebaño de los súbditos del Emperador, y ahora había un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}. Por tanto, mantenían a la dinastía bajo una vigilancia estrecha, y los almirantes temían tener que declararle la guerra a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente algún día.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: La Armada Imperial estaba inquieta por el ascenso de von Valancius. Se consideraban los perros guardianes del rebaño de los súbditos del Emperador, y ahora había un{mf||a} nuev{mf|o|a} am{mf|o|a}. Por tanto, mantenían a la dinastía bajo una vigilancia estrecha, y los almirantes temían tener que declararle la guerra a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente algún día.

languages.text: Der Imperialen Kriegsflotte gefiel der Aufstieg des Hauses von Valancius nicht. Sie betrachtete sich als Wachhund der Herde von Untertanen des Imperators, und plötzlich war da {mf|ein neuer Rudelführer|eine neue Rudelführerin}. Also wurde die Dynastie sehr genau beobachtet, und die Admiräle fürchteten, dass sie eines Tagen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in den Krieg ziehen mussten.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Der Imperialen Kriegsflotte gefiel der Aufstieg des Hauses von Valancius nicht. Sie betrachtete sich als Wachhund der Herde von Untertanen des Imperators, und plötzlich war da {mf|ein neuer Rudelführer|eine neue Rudelführerin}. Also wurde die Dynastie sehr genau beobachtet, und die Admiräle fürchteten, dass sie eines Tagen gegen {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in den Krieg ziehen mussten.

languages.text: İmparatorluk Donanması, von Valanciusların yükselişine karşı ihtiyatlıydı. Kendilerini İmparator'un tebaasını koruyan bekçi köpekleri olarak görüyorlardı ve sürünün artık yeni bir efendisi vardı. Bu sebeple hanedanlığı dikkatle takip ettiler. Amiraller, bir gün Hür Tacir'e karşı savaşmak zorunda kalmaktan korkuyordu.
languages.original_text: The Imperial Navy was wary of the rise of the von Valancius. They saw themselves as dogs guarding the flock of the Emperor's subjects, and there was a new master of the pack. Therefore, the dynasty was watched with utmost diligence, and the admirals feared that one day they would have to go to war against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk Donanması, von Valancius'un yükselişine karşı ihtiyatlıydı. Kendilerini İmparator'un tebaalarını koruyan bekçi köpekleri olarak görüyorlardı ve sürünün yeni bir efendisi vardı. Bu sebeple hanedanlığı dikkatle takip ettiler ve amiraller bir gün Hür Tacir'e karşı savaşa girmek zorunda kalmaktan korkuyordu.
